mapper.insert:
select gathering_gath_no_seq.nextval from dual
insert into GATHERING(GATH_NO, GATH_Title, U_ID, GATH_ADDR, GATH_ADDR2, GATH_CLOSE, GATH_DAY, GATH_DESC, GATH_AMOUNT, GATH_CREATE_DATE, GATH_TYPE_NO, GATH_STATUS_NO, CITY_NO, GATH_READCOUNT) VALUES(#{gathNo},#{gathTitle},#{uId},#{gathAddr},#{gathAddr2},#{gathClose},#{gathDay},#{gathDesc},#{gathAmount},sysdate,#{gathTypeNo},1, #{cityNo},0)
mapper.update: update gathering set gath_title=#{gathTitle}, gath_addr=#{gathAddr}, gath_addr2=#{gathAddr2}, gath_close=#{gathClose}, gath_day=#{gathDay}, gath_desc=#{gathDesc}, gath_amount=#{gathAmount},gath_type_no=#{gathTypeNo},city_no=#{cityNo} where gath_no=#{gathNo}
update gathering set gath_status_no=#{gathStatusNo} where gath_no=#{gathNo}
update gathering set gath_readcount=gath_readcount+1 where gath_no=#{gathNo}
